channel.title: Items?
channel.description:
This may be easy to do, idk. But how do I change item names and what it says when you examine them? Also, please don't flame if this is in the wrong section, I don't know if this has to do with client, I'de assume it would be server side.
Thanks for any help. ~ Daikenkai

item.title: Items?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

On top of everything else, the item configuration file is mainly for shops, and in your server’s files, itemName.

Read full topic

item.title: Items?
item.dc:creator: @Daikenkai Daikenkai
item.description:
@Daikenkai wrote:

Oh, don’t worry guys, i fixed it… thanks a lot everyone

~ Dai

Read full topic

item.title: Items?
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

I think it is Client Sided,

If you go to Class8.java in your Client folder… Do you get this?

if(i == 13643) - THIS IS THE NUMBER OF THE ITEM (the item ID in the ID lists...){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14059; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1300; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = -2; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14060;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14060;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Statius's warhammer";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A giant warhammer made from powerful metal".getBytes();//examin info - THIS IS THE EXAMINE INFO! }

if(i == 13643) - THIS IS THE NUMBER OF THE ITEM (the item ID in the ID lists…)

class8.aByteArray178 = “A giant warhammer made from powerful metal”.getBytes();//examin info - THIS IS THE EXAMINE INFO!

Read full topic

item.title: Items?
item.dc:creator: @Daikenkai Daikenkai
item.description:
@Daikenkai wrote:

I forgot to mention that the items that I want to change does not have any integers. The items are called ‘Spined’. The name nor examine information change when I try in Item.cfg. I was also attempting to change the color of spined armor. But without the integers I do believe that I cannot do that. So, if anyone has the integers for spined armor I would rep++ for them (even though I can’t :(). But I would really appreciate them.

I have another question, in an item int, on the first line where it says:

if (i == ####)

Is the #### the item ID or the model number???

Thanks, If any one has the integers for Spined armor I would very much appreciate them

Thanks a lot
~ Dai

Read full topic

your server will be more Laggy![/quote]

No it wouldn’t… Just change the interface name.

item.title: Items?
item.dc:creator: @xxlifeskilxx xxlifeskilxx
item.description:
@xxlifeskilxx wrote:

in most sources, there is item ids and tons of pages of them, now we all know that not EVERY item is on moparscape, but most if them are, so what i did for this is i went in into my item ids, and got the codes for the items and just hanged the names next to the id for it, you can als do this for NPC’s.

~skill~
